{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/title|operator coroutine_handle&lt;&gt;}}
{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr operator coroutine_handle&lt;&gt;() const noexcept;
}}

This conversion function converts a {{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;Promise&gt;}} value to a {{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;&gt;}} holding the same underlying address. It effectively erases the promise type.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;&gt;::from_address(address())}}
